transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Cursed Dreams

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.
Set: Tiger Palm increases the damage of your next melee ability by 5.0%.
(4) Set: Your other melee abilities increase the damage of your next Tiger Palm by 25%, stacking up to 6 times. 15% of Tiger Palm's damage is dealt onto nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: Set: Tiger Palm increases the damage of your next melee ability by 5.0%.
(4) Set: Your other melee abilities increase the damage of your next Tiger Palm by 25%, stacking up to 6 times. 15% of Tiger Palm's damage is dealt onto nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a high chance to summon a phantom ethereal, dealing 181,888 Shadow damage to your target and 16,369 Shadow damage to all other enemies caught in its path. 

If the target is below 35% health, this effect summons two additional phantoms at 25% effectiveness.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Agility up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 77,294 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a high chance to apply Queensbane to your target, dealing 130,012 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.
